nodes.text: Justahl was a male Vice President of a company. He wore spectacles and dressed in a Dervdisi fashioned suit. Justahl once scheduled a meeting with several other individuals, and seemed to be late to the meeting. One of the attendees stated that if Justahl did not arrive on time, then his share options would be given to Kemends. In order to make the meeting on time and make an entrance, Justahl used a Hush-About AJP-400 jetpack to arrive at the meeting room which was located 200 meters above the ground.
Justahl first appeared in Galladinium's Fantastic Technology and was later mentioned in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
